settings.heading: Why Choose Our Fly Screens for Timber Windows

settings.text:
Ezy Screens‚Äô timber fly screens for windows are crafted to blend seamlessly with classic timber frames, protecting your home without changing its look or operation. Each screen is made to fit securely, providing reliable insect protection that doesn‚Äôt interfere with how your windows open or close.


Our UV-protected fibreglass mesh ensures long-lasting clarity and airflow while resisting fading under the harsh Australian sun. Meanwhile, our strong aluminium cassettes won‚Äôt rust or warp, making them ideal for humid or coastal environments where durability matters most.


Even better, our innovative design requires only 35 mm of unobstructed depth in your frame, meaning they fit perfectly into most timber window styles without bulky modifications. Whether your home features casement, double-hung, or awning timber windows, these screens are engineered to suit.

settings.heading: Designed for a Perfect Fit with Timber Frames
settings.text:
Every home is unique, and so are its windows. That‚Äôs why our fly screens for timber windows are made for a precise fit that enhances‚Äîrather than hides‚Äîyour window‚Äôs natural timber character. The slimline aluminium frame pairs beautifully with wooden surrounds, maintaining your home‚Äôs warmth and aesthetic charm.


Installation is quick and straightforward. Each screen slots neatly into place, creating a secure, snug fit that keeps insects out but lets fresh air flow freely. Because our components are built from strong, rust-resistant aluminium, they won‚Äôt corrode or weaken over time‚Äîoffering years of dependable performance, even in older homes.

settings.heading: Easy Online Ordering and Delivery
settings.text:
Getting started couldn‚Äôt be simpler. Just measure your timber windows, choose your preferred size and colour, and place your order online. Every screen is made to measure for a precise fit, with clear, step-by-step DIY instructions included.


We proudly offer fast, nationwide delivery, so wherever you are in Australia, you can enjoy custom-fit insect protection without the hassle of showroom visits or costly tradespeople.

settings.heading: Simple Care and Maintenance
settings.text:
Looking after your timber window fly screens is easy. For a quick refresh, gently dust or vacuum the mesh to remove built-up pollen and debris. Wipe the aluminium frame with a soft cloth and mild detergent, then rinse and dry. A quick check each season ensures your screens continue to perform beautifully year-round.


Built to last, our UV-resistant mesh and aluminium frame mean less maintenance and more peace of mind, keeping your timber windows looking their best while keeping insects firmly out.

settings.heading: Are fly screens for timber windows easy to install?
settings.row_content: Yes. Our screens are designed for simple DIY installation. Just measure, fit, and secure. No specialist tools or drilling into your timber frames are required.

settings.heading: Do fly screens affect the appearance of timber windows?
settings.row_content: Not at all. Their slim aluminium design integrates neatly into the frame, maintaining your timber‚Äôs original charm and finish.

settings.heading: Are these fly screens durable for older timber windows?
settings.row_content: Absolutely. With strong aluminium cassettes and UV-protected mesh, they‚Äôre built to perform reliably, even on vintage or weathered frames.

settings.heading: How do I clean and maintain timber window fly screens?
settings.row_content: Simply vacuum or wipe down the mesh, clean the frame with soapy water, and inspect occasionally for wear.
